sub_title: Postdoctoral Researcher in Plant Breeding. Bio-based Economy group at Wageningen University & Research
summary:
2021-Present 

I'm currently working as a postdoc at the Plant Breeding department of Wageningen University, within the Biobased Economy group. I study how to improve the protein extractability from carrot leaves in order to establish the basis for a plant breeding program for carrots. I'm looking at cell wall composition, ascorbic acid and phenols and their possible interactions with proteins in the protein extraction process.

2018-2020

Marie Curie Fellow whithin the Society and Enterprise panel. I work at KeyGene (The Netherlands), developing the AIR project (Aerial Inulin and Rubber). This project is divided in two main branches; in one hand we breed Taraxacum koksaghyz for higher yield of rubber. In the other hand we study the best conditions to grow this species in a hydroponic system in growth chambers under LED lights and different sorts of abiotic stress, for a higher yield of rubber and inulin. 

2015

PhD in Biology- Universidad de Pais Vasco (UPV).

2008-2012

I worked as a PhD student funded by a "Candido de Iturriaga y Maria de Dañobeitia" fellowship at Neiker (Basque Research Institute), at the Biotechnology Department, There I worked with Taraxacum koksaghyz (rubber dandelion), doing agronomic research, in vitro culture, analysing rubber and inulin content and developing the first linkage map of the species. 

2006

Master "Planning and Management of Water Resources"- Universidad Politécnica de Cartagena.

2004

Diploma de Estudios Avanzados (DEA) School of Veterinary-Universidad Complutense de Madrid.

2002-2006

I worked four years at "Centro de Investigacion Agraria de Albaladejito" (Cuenca), at the Department of herbaceous crops  as a researcher, doing lab and field work. My working species was Vicia narbonensis and I developed antinutritional factors analysis, and agronomic research.

2002-2006

Student of Marine Science- Universidad de Vigo- (5 subjects left to finish the degree).

1994-1999

Degree in Biology (Universidad de Alcalá de Henares).

school.name: Universidad del País Vasco/Euskal Herriko Unibertsitatea

education.degree_name: Master in Planification and Management Hydrological Sources.

projects.title: Developing tools to breed protein crops.
projects.description: Extracting proteins from vegetable waste streams will help in the transition to a more plant based  human diet and will also reduce GHG emission. In this context, we work improving the extractability of proteins from carrot leaves, as one of the main vegetable waste streams, due to the importance of the crop Worldwide. We look into cell wall composition as the main physical barrier and into the interactions between ascorbic acid and phenolics, with proteins, as possible chemical barriers.

contributors.headline: Postdoctoral Researcher in Plant Breeding. Bio-based Economy group at Wageningen University & Research
Full Professor Bioresources Breeding and Genetics. Group Leader Biobased Economy at Wageningen University & Research

projects.title: AIR (Aerial Inulin and Rubber)
projects.description: 2 years Marie Curie Project + 6  months KeyGene contract. The Air project was divided in two main branches. In one hand we bred for a better yield of rubber in Taraxacum koksaghyz (including apomixis experiments). In the other hand we study the best conditions to grow Taraxacum koksaghyz in hydroponic systems, in a growth chamber under LED lights, to enhance the rubber and inulin contents.

profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher in Plant Breeding. Genetics of Protein Crops.

profile_positions.description:
Project: AIR (Aerial Inulin and Rubber). 
It is a project granted by the European Comission with a Marie Slodowska Curie Individual Fellowship under the panel Society and Enterprise.
profile_positions.title: Marie Curie Postdoc

company.name: AAMADARCHI SOCIEDAD COOPERATIVA PEQUEÑA PROFESIONAL- - Research and innovation division

profile_positions.description: Literature research and writting of proposals. I helped in contacting different institutions for the organization of a consortium for an Horizon 2020 call.
profile_positions.title: Proposal writting and Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Project: 
"Sistema de Implantacion de Cultivos Aeroponicos en Fachadas Vegetales para la Regeneracion y Rehabilitacion Urbana" "Implantation system of aeroponic crops in green facades for urban regenerations and rehabilitation").
ERAIKAL funding for the proposal preparation for a Horizon 2020 call. Research project of a new green wall system for urban restoration and regeneration.
I was employed to research, partially write and coordinate the project.
profile_positions.title: Researcher and project co-coordinator.

profile_positions.description:
Project: EU-FP7-KBBE-2007-3-1-06 "EU-based Production and Exploitation of Alternative Rubber and Latex Sources EU-PEARLS".
Lab and agronomy field work. Evaluation of how water, density, population and fertilizer affects the rubber and inulin production in Taraxacum koksaghyz and Taraxacum brevicorniculatum.   Extraction and quantification of rubber and inulin, Taraxacum koksaghyz in vitro culture, molecular markers, QTLs, DNA extraction...Together with some colleagues we developed the first linkage map of Taraxacum koksaghyz.
profile_positions.title: PhD student (2 years fellowship+ 2 basic research technician)

profile_positions.description: In the framework of the EU-PEARLS project I learnt how the PhD student of Munster was doing symilar work as I was doing in Spain. We worked in the field and in the lab, in plant density and fertilizing essays as well as in rubber extraction and measurement.
profile_positions.title: Institute for Plant Biology and Biotechnology of Münster - Biotechnology  Internship

profile_positions.description: Sales force of a farmaceutical company in the division of specialists doctors.
profile_positions.title: Medical sales representative. Specialists.

company.name: Asamblea de Cooperación por la Paz (ACPP)

profile_positions.company: Asamblea de Cooperación por la Paz (ACPP)
profile_positions.description: Participant in a regional International Cooperation program for the youth. I spent three months working with the expatriates of the NGO Asamblea de cooperación por la paz, writing projects on social and sanitary basic infrastructures and doing the latter follow up. We worked together with the local communities.
profile_positions.title: International Cooperation.

profile_positions.description: Selection and marking of trees for selective felling in a particular property of the Natural Park  " Serrania de Cuenca" (Cuenca-Spain).
profile_positions.title: Pine tree selector for selective felling.

profile_positions.description:
Maintenance of the facilities of the fish farm in Uña.
Feeding the fish in the farm.
profile_positions.title: Fish farm technician.

profile_positions.description: I worked as an environmental educator for schools and special groups and as a specialist touristic guide at the Archipelago, telling the tourists about the history and nature of the islands. I did trekking tours as well as kayak and diving tours, pointing allways the endemic fauna and flora.
profile_positions.title: Touristic guide and Environmental instructor.

volunteer_experiences.role: International Cooperation in field and office (Dominican Republic)
volunteer_experiences.description: I worked at ACPP NGO.I wrote proposals to get funding for building social and sanitary basic infrastructures. I latter went to the local communities to do the follow-up. Since two tropical storms devastated the country, I also participated in emergency help.
Volunteer at the "Ecology Working Team of S´Albufera de Mallorca".

volunteer_experiences.role: Participant in the Cooperation Group between the Basque and the Saharan Youth

company.name: Working Group between the Basque Youth  and the Saharan Youth.

volunteer_experiences.description:
A group of youth people was started in the Basque Country with the aim to fight for the rights of the Saharan youth. We went on a trip to the Saharan refugees camps in order to do a cultural exchange and enhance our knowledge of the problem they deal with and their needs.
Once back again in Spain we took some actions to ask for a solution to the Saharan conflict.
